title: More 'new' handwriting
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Diane O'Connor and Materials Production, Curriculum Branch, Ed Dept of Vic
brief_description: This is a sequel to”The New handwriting” which is part of a compilation tape entitled “Learning handwriting” It provides practical advice on such issues as the use of speed loops, alternative letter shapings and embellished handwriting. Also looks at teacher reactions to the change in style.
